original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid /
translated: the once-returners are also essentially nonexistent,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na /🔽gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang rung /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa rnams kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin na / gal te bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang rung /
translated: and the stream enterers are also essentially nonexistent,🔽then whether I fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect buddhahood

original: gal te mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyang rung ste /
analyzed: gal te mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyang rung ste /
translated: or do not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect buddhahood,

original: chos thams cad ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni /
translated: all phenomena are essentially nonexistent.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin gyi /
translated: The nature of non-entities is the nature of all dharmas.

original: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byas te /
analyzed: ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byas te /
translated: I must fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening and

original: sems can dngos po'i 'du shes la spyod pa thams cad dngos po med pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: sems can dngos po'i 'du shes la spyod pa thams cad dngos po med pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o //
translated: establish all sentient beings who engage in the perception of entities in non-entities.’

original: snyam ste / rab 'byor /
analyzed: snyam ste / rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'jug ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'jug ste /
translated: bodhisattva great beings set out for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening in order to lead all sentient beings to complete nirvāṇa.

original: mthar gyis spyad pa dang / mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis nan tan du bya ba gang la @359b bslab cing sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de lta bu'i mthar gyis spyad pa
analyzed: mthar gyis spyad pa dang / mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis nan tan du bya ba gang la @359b bslab cing sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de lta bu'i mthar gyis spyad pa
translated: the stages of practice, the stages of training, and the stages of perseverance, in which the bodhisattvas of the past, the great spiritual heroes, attained manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment.

original: dang / mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis nan tan du bya ba rtsom mo //🔽de thog mar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: dang / mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis nan tan du bya ba rtsom mo // de thog mar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: He will commence the stages of practice, the stages of training, and the stages of perseverance.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod do //
translated: He will engage in the six transcendent perfections, beginning with the transcendent perfection of generosity, the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline, the transcendent perfection of tolerance, the transcendent perfection of perseverance, the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration,🔽and the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

original: de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bdag kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /
analyzed: de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe bdag kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo /
translated: When they practice the perfection of generosity, they themselves give gifts.

original: pha rol kyang sbyin pa la rab tu gzhog go //
analyzed: pha rol kyang sbyin pa la rab tu gzhog go //
translated: They also establish others in generosity.

original: sbyin pa'i legs pa brjod do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i legs pa brjod do //
translated: They praise generosity.

original: sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de dag gi'ang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do //
analyzed: sems can gzhan gang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de dag gi'ang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do //
translated: They praise those other sentient beings who give gifts, and they rejoice in that.

original: de sbyin pa des skyid pa chen po'i tshogs thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de sbyin pa des skyid pa chen po'i tshogs thob par 'gyur te /
translated: Through that generosity, they attain a great heap of happiness.

original: skyon dang / ser sna med pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par bya ba dang / sbyin pa yongs su gtong bar byed de /🔽zas 'dod pa la ni /🔽zas / skom 'dod pa la ni /
analyzed: skyon dang / ser sna med pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par bya ba dang / sbyin pa yongs su gtong bar byed de / zas 'dod pa la ni / zas / skom 'dod pa la ni /
translated: They give gifts with a mind free of faults and stinginess.🔽To those who want food, they give food.

original: skom / bzhon pa 'dod pa la ni /🔽gzhon pa / gos 'dod pa la ni /🔽gos / spos dod pa la ni /🔽spos / phreng ba 'dod pa la ni /
analyzed: skom / bzhon pa 'dod pa la ni / gzhon pa / gos 'dod pa la ni / gos / spos dod pa la ni / spos / phreng ba 'dod pa la ni /
translated: To those who want drink, they give drink.🔽To those who want vehicles, they give vehicles.🔽To those who want clothing, they give clothing.

original: phreng ba / byug pa 'dod pa la ni /
analyzed: phreng ba / byug pa 'dod pa la ni /
translated: To those who want incense, they give incense.🔽To those who want garlands, they give garlands.

original: byug pa / mal cha 'dod pa la ni /
analyzed: byug pa / mal cha 'dod pa la ni /
translated: To those who want ointments, they give ointments.🔽To those who want beds, they give beds.

original: mal cha / gnas 'dod pa la ni /
analyzed: mal cha / gnas 'dod pa la ni /
translated: to those who desire bedding,

original: gnas mar me 'dod pa la ni /
analyzed: gnas mar me 'dod pa la ni /
translated: to those who desire lamps,

original: @360a *// mar me /
analyzed: @360a *// mar me /
translated: lamps,

original: nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bee d'urya dang / dung dang / man shal dang / byu ru dang / gser dang / dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni /
analyzed: nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bee d'urya dang / dung dang / man shal dang / byu ru dang / gser dang / dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni /
translated: to those who desire jewels, pearls, beryl, conch shells, malachite, coral, gold, and silver,

original: nor bu dang / mu tig dang / be d'urya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dang / dngul yongs su gtong ba nas mi'i yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba dag kyang de dag la gtong ba'i bar du ste /
analyzed: nor bu dang / mu tig dang / be d'urya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / gser dang / dngul yongs su gtong ba nas mi'i yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba dag kyang de dag la gtong ba'i bar du ste /
translated: he gives them jewels, pearls, beryl, conch shells, malachite, coral, gold, and silver, up to giving them whatever human necessities they may need.

original: de sbyin pa de nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: de sbyin pa de nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By that very generosity, he perfects the aggregate of morality.

original: lha'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do //
analyzed: lha'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do //
translated: He attains the greatness of the gods.

original: mi'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do //
analyzed: mi'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do //
translated: He attains the greatness of humans.

original: de sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims de nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po rab tu thob par byed do //
analyzed: de sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims de nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po rab tu thob par byed do //
translated: By that very generosity and morality, he attains the aggregate of concentration.

original: de sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyis shes rab kyi phung po rab tu thob par byed do //
analyzed: de sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyis shes rab kyi phung po rab tu thob par byed do //
translated: By means of that giving, morality, and concentration, he attains the aggregate of wisdom.

original: de sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab de nyid kyis rnam par grol ba'i phung po rab tu thob par byed do //
analyzed: de sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab de nyid kyis rnam par grol ba'i phung po rab tu thob par byed do //
translated: By means of that giving, morality, concentration, and wisdom, he attains the aggregate of liberation.

original: de sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba de nyid kyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po rab tu thob par byed do //
analyzed: de sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba de nyid kyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po rab tu thob par byed do //
translated: By means of that giving, morality, concentration, wisdom, and liberation, he attains the aggregate of the vision of the wisdom of liberation.

original: de sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba de nyid kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /
analyzed: de sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba de nyid kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /
translated: By means of that giving, morality, concentration, wisdom, liberation, and vision of the wisdom of liberation, he passes beyond the stages of the Sravakas and Pratyekabuddhas and enters into the certainty of the Bodhisattva.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i @360b skyon med par zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i @360b skyon med par zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas /
translated: having entered into the secure state of a bodhisattva, they purify a buddhafield,

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: ripen beings, and attain the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
translated: Having attained the knowledge of all aspects, they turn the wheel of the Dharma.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing /
translated: Having turned the wheel of the Dharma, they establish beings in the three vehicles and🔽liberate them from saṃsāra.

original: 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do; ;rab 'byor /
analyzed: 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do; ;rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti,

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: that is how

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pas mthar gyis spyod pa yod pa yin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pas mthar gyis spyod pa yod pa yin te /
translated: bodhisattva great beings practice generosity in sequence.

original: de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do //
analyzed: de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do //
translated: And all of that is unapprehendable.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: de ni / 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do /
translated: it is because it has no intrinsic nature.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste bdag kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, bodhisattva-mahāsattvas, from the first production of the thought of enlightenment onward, themselves practice the perfection of morality,

original: gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo //
analyzed: gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo //
translated: they encourage others to practice the perfection of morality,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod do //
translated: they praise the perfection of morality,

original: gzhan gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi'ang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do //
analyzed: gzhan gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi'ang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do //
translated: and they rejoice in those who practice the perfection of morality.

original: de tshul khrims des lha'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do //
analyzed: de tshul khrims des lha'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do //
translated: By that morality, they attain the greatness of the gods,

original: mi'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do; ;de nor med pa'i sems can rnams la nor byin zhing tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: mi'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do; ;de nor med pa'i sems can rnams la nor byin zhing tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do //
translated: they attain the greatness of humans, and they give wealth to those who are without wealth, establishing them in morality,

original: ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do //
translated: establishing them in meditative stabilization,

original: shes rab la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: shes rab la rab tu 'god do //
translated: establishing them in wisdom,

original: rnam par grol ba la rab @361a *//🔽tu 'god do //🔽rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do //🔽de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba la rab @361a *// tu 'god do // rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do // de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /
translated: He establishes them in the aggregate of morality, the aggregate of concentration, the aggregate of wisdom, the aggregate of liberation, and the aggregate of the vision of liberated wisdom.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /
translated: Through that aggregate of morality, the aggregate of concentration, the aggregate of wisdom, the aggregate of liberation, and the aggregate of the vision of liberated wisdom, he transcends the stages of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas and enters into the faultless certainty of the bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas /
translated: Having entered into the faultless certainty of the bodhisattvas, he purifies the buddhafield🔽and brings beings to maturity.

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: having brought beings to maturity, they cause them to attain the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
translated: Having attained the knowledge of all aspects, they turn the wheel of the Dharma.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing /
translated: Having turned the wheel of the Dharma, they establish beings in the three vehicles and

original: 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do //
analyzed: 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do //
translated: liberate them from saṃsāra.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
translated: Subhūti, in this way

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyis mthar gyis spyod pa yod pa yin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyis mthar gyis spyod pa yod pa yin te /
translated: the bodhisattva great beings have the practice of morality in stages.

original: de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do //🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And all of that is unapprehendable.

original: de ni / 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: If you ask why, it is because they have no intrinsic nature.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems @361b dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste bdag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems @361b dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste bdag kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, from the time when the bodhisattva great beings first begin to set their mind on enlightenment, they themselves practice the perfection of patience,

original: gzhan yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo //
analyzed: gzhan yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul lo //
translated: Moreover, they incite others to the perfection of patience.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod do //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs pa brjod do //
translated: They praise the perfection of patience.

original: gzhan gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi'ang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do //
analyzed: gzhan gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi'ang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do //
translated: They praise those others who practice the perfection of patience, and they rejoice in harmony with them.

original: de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byed do //
analyzed: de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byed do //
translated: When they practice the perfection of patience, they satisfy sentient beings with gifts.

original: tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do //
translated: They establish them in morality.

original: ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do //
translated: They establish them in meditative stabilization.

original: shes rab la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: shes rab la rab tu 'god do //
translated: They establish them in wisdom.

original: rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do //
translated: They establish them in liberation.

original: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do //
translated: They establish them in the seeing of the wisdom of liberation.

original: de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /
analyzed: de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /
translated: aggregate of concentration, aggregate of wisdom, aggregate of liberation, and aggregate of the knowledge and vision of liberation, having transcended the śrāvaka and pratyekabuddha levels, through that aggregate of morality,

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /
translated: aggregate of concentration, aggregate of wisdom, aggregate of liberation, and aggregate of the knowledge and vision of liberation, they enter into the faultlessness of the bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas /
translated: Having entered into the faultlessness of the bodhisattvas,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas /🔽sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas rnam pa thams @362a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas rnam pa thams @362a *//
translated: they purify a buddhafield.

original: cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: Having brought beings to maturity, they attain the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
translated: having attained the knowledge of all modes, he sets rolling the wheel of the Dharma;

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing /
translated: having set rolling the wheel of the Dharma, he establishes beings in the three vehicles and

original: 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do //
analyzed: 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do //
translated: liberates them from Samsara.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
translated: In this way, Subhuti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pas mthar gyis spyod pa yod pa yin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pas mthar gyis spyod pa yod pa yin te /
translated: the Bodhisattva, the great being, who courses in the perfection of patience, gradually comes to the knowledge of all modes.

original: de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do //
analyzed: de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do //
translated: And all that is not got at.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de ni / 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: Because it has no own-being.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste bdag kyang dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus rtsom mo //
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste bdag kyang dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson 'grus rtsom mo //
translated: Furthermore, the Bodhisattva, the great being, from the first thought of enlightenment onwards, himself exerts vigour in wholesome dharmas,

original: gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par bskul lo //
analyzed: gzhan yang brtson 'grus la yang dag par bskul lo //
translated: he instigates others to vigour,

original: brtson 'grus kyi legs pa brjod do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi legs pa brjod do //
translated: he speaks in praise of vigour,🔽and he approves of vigour.

original: gzhan gang brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi'ang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do //
analyzed: gzhan gang brtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag gi'ang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do //
translated: He also praises the good qualities of others who are practicing diligence, and he rejoices in them with a sympathetic mind.

original: de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byed do //
analyzed: de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byed do //
translated: “He practices the perfection of diligence and satisfies beings with gifts.

original: tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do //
translated: He establishes them in morality.

original: ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do //
translated: He establishes them in meditative stabilization.

original: shes rab la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: shes rab la rab tu 'god do //
translated: He establishes them in wisdom.

original: rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do //
translated: He establishes them in liberation.

original: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do //
translated: He establishes them in the vision of the wisdom of liberation.

original: de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / @362b ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /
analyzed: de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / @362b ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /
translated: “With that aggregate of morality, that aggregate of meditative stabilization, that aggregate of wisdom, that aggregate of liberation, and that aggregate of the vision of the wisdom of liberation, he passes beyond the śrāvaka and pratyekabuddha levels.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /
translated: aggregate of wisdom, aggregate of liberation, and aggregate of the knowledge and vision of liberation, he enters into the secure state of a bodhisattva.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas /
translated: Having entered into the secure state of a bodhisattva, he purifies the buddhafield

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: and brings beings to maturity.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas /
translated: Having attained the knowledge of all modes,

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
translated: he sets rolling the wheel of the Dharma.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do //
translated: Having set rolling the wheel of the Dharma, he establishes beings in the three vehicles and delivers them from the samsara of the hells, animal births, and the realm of hungry ghosts, from the samsara of the gods, anti-gods, and humans.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
translated: In this way, Subhuti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyis mthar gyis spyod pa yod pa yin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyis mthar gyis spyod pa yod pa yin te /
translated: the Bodhisattva, the great being, by means of his perseverance, gradually courses in the perfection of wisdom, and gradually fulfills the perfection of wisdom.

original: de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do //
analyzed: de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do //
translated: All of them are not apprehended.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de ni / 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: Because they have no intrinsic nature.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste bdag kyang tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go /🔽gzhan yang tshad med pa dang / bsam @363a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste bdag kyang tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go / gzhan yang tshad med pa dang / bsam @363a *//
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings, starting from the first production of the thought, themselves enter the immeasurables, the concentrations, and the formless absorptions,

original: gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la rab tu 'god do //
translated: and they also establish others in the immeasurables, the concentrations, and the formless absorptions.

original: tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod do //
analyzed: tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi legs pa brjod do //
translated: They speak in praise of the immeasurables, the concentrations, and the formless absorptions,

original: gzhan tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par bzhag pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do //
analyzed: gzhan tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par bzhag pa de dag gi legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do //
translated: and they speak in praise of others who are absorbed in the immeasurables, the concentrations, and the formless absorptions, welcoming it with favorable thoughts.

original: de tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la gnas shing /
analyzed: de tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la gnas shing /
translated: They abide in the immeasurables, the concentrations, and the formless absorptions.

original: sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byed de //
analyzed: sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byed de //
translated: They satisfy sentient beings with generosity.

original: tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do //
translated: They establish them in ethical discipline.

original: ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do //
translated: They establish them in meditative concentration.

original: shes rab la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: shes rab la rab tu 'god do //
translated: They establish them in wisdom.

original: rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do //
translated: They establish them in liberation.

original: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do //
translated: They establish them in the seeing of liberated wisdom.

original: de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /
analyzed: de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /
translated: With that aggregate of ethical discipline, that aggregate of meditative concentration, that aggregate of wisdom, that aggregate of liberation, and that aggregate of the vision of liberated wisdom, they transcend the levels of the śrāvakas and the pratyekabuddhas.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /
translated: By means of that very aggregate of concentration, aggregate of wisdom, aggregate of liberation, and aggregate of the knowledge and vision of liberation, he enters into the secure state of a bodhisattva.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas @363b sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas @363b sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas /
translated: Having entered into the secure state of a bodhisattva, he purifies the buddhafield.

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas /
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas /
translated: Having brought beings to maturity,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: he attains the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
translated: Having attained the knowledge of all aspects, he sets the wheel of the Dharma turning.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do //
translated: Having set the wheel of the Dharma turning, he establishes beings in the three vehicles and liberates them from saṃsāra.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
translated: Subhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyis mthar gyis spyod pa yod pa yin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyis mthar gyis spyod pa yod pa yin te /
translated: thus there is a bodhisattva great being’s successive practice of the meditative stabilizations.

original: de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do //
analyzed: de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do //
translated: All of them are unapprehendable.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de ni / 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do; ;rab 'byor /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do; ;rab 'byor /
translated: Because they have no intrinsic nature.

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byed do //
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byed do //
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom from the time when they first begin arousing the mind of awakening satisfy sentient beings with generosity.

original: tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do //
translated: They establish them in morality.

original: ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do //
translated: They establish them in meditative stabilization.

original: shes rab la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: shes rab la rab tu 'god do //
translated: They establish them in wisdom.

original: rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'god do //
translated: They establish them in liberation.

original: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do //
translated: They establish them in the vision of the wisdom of liberation.

original: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When they practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: bdag kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo //
analyzed: bdag kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo //
translated: they themselves give gifts.

original: tshul khrims srung ngo /
analyzed: tshul khrims srung ngo /
translated: They themselves maintain morality.

original: bzod pa sgrub bo //
analyzed: bzod pa sgrub bo //
translated: They themselves cultivate patience.

original: brtson 'grus rtsom mo; ;bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog go /
analyzed: brtson 'grus rtsom mo; ;bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog go /
translated: They practice diligence. They cultivate meditative concentration.

original: shes rab sgom mo //
analyzed: shes rab sgom mo //
translated: They cultivate wisdom.

original: gzhan yang sbyin pa la rab tu gzhog go /
analyzed: gzhan yang sbyin pa la rab tu gzhog go /
translated: They encourage others to practice generosity.

original: tshul khrims la rab tu gzhog go /🔽bzod pa la rab tu gzhog go /
analyzed: tshul khrims la rab tu gzhog go / bzod pa la rab tu gzhog go /
translated: They encourage others to practice discipline.🔽They encourage others to practice patience.

original: brtson @364a *// 'grus la rab tu gzhog go /
analyzed: brtson @364a *// 'grus la rab tu gzhog go /
translated: They encourage others to practice diligence.

original: ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gzhog go /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gzhog go /
translated: They encourage others to cultivate meditative concentration.

original: shes rab la rab tu gzhog go /
analyzed: shes rab la rab tu gzhog go /
translated: They encourage others to cultivate wisdom.

original: sbyin pa'i legs pa brjod do //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i legs pa brjod do //
translated: They speak in praise of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi legs pa brjod do //🔽bzod pa'i legs pa brjod do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi legs pa brjod do // bzod pa'i legs pa brjod do //
translated: They speak in praise of discipline.🔽They speak in praise of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi legs pa brjod do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi legs pa brjod do //
translated: They speak in praise of diligence.

original: bsam gtan gyi legs pa brjod do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi legs pa brjod do //
translated: They speak in praise of meditative concentration.

original: shes rab kyi legs pa brjod do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi legs pa brjod do //
translated: They speak in praise of wisdom.

original: gang gzhan sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa sgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa dang / shes rab sgom pa de dag gi'ang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do //
analyzed: gang gzhan sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang / tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa sgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa dang / shes rab sgom pa de dag gi'ang legs pa brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do //
translated: He praises the good qualities of others who practice generosity, who guard moral discipline, who cultivate tolerance, who undertake perseverance, who become equipoised in meditative concentration, and who cultivate wisdom.

original: de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: He rejoices in accord with those who practice the perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of tolerance, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of meditative concentration, and the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dang / thabs mkhas pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dang / thabs mkhas pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go /
translated: Through that perfection of wisdom and skillful means, he passes beyond the śrāvaka and pratyekabuddha levels and enters into the secure state of a bodhisattva.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas /
translated: Having entered into the secure state of a bodhisattva, he purifies a buddhafield🔽and brings beings to maturity.

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do //
translated: having brought beings to maturity, they cause them to attain the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas /
translated: Having attained the knowledge of all aspects,

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro //
translated: they turn the wheel of the Dharma.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams @364b theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams @364b theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do //
translated: Having turned the wheel of the Dharma, they establish beings in the three vehicles and liberate them from saṃsāra.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
translated: Subhūti, that is how

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis mthar gyis spyod pa rtsom ste; de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis mthar gyis spyod pa rtsom ste; de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do //
translated: bodhisattva great beings who practice the perfection of wisdom gradually set out, and all that is unfindable.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de ni / 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do ////🔽shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do //// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa //
translated: It is because it has no intrinsic nature.🔽Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po nyis brgya don gcig pa //
analyzed: bam po nyis brgya don gcig pa //
translated: Volume 201

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar gyis spyad pa dang / mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis 'jug pa la slob ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar gyis spyad pa dang / mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis 'jug pa la slob ste /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings train in the progression of practice, the progression of training, and the progression of engagement.

original: de sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
analyzed: de sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
translated: From the very first production of the thought, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects,

original: chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid rtogs par byed de /
analyzed: chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid rtogs par byed de /
translated: they realize that all phenomena are the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: de sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom mo //
analyzed: de sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom mo //
translated: They cultivate the recollection of the Buddha.

original: chos rjes su dran pa sgom mo //
analyzed: chos rjes su dran pa sgom mo //
translated: They cultivate the recollection of the Dharma.

original: dge 'dun rjes su dran pa sgom mo //
analyzed: dge 'dun rjes su dran pa sgom mo //
translated: They cultivate the recollection of the Saṅgha.

original: tshul khrims rjes su dran pa sgom mo //🔽gtong ba rjes su dran pa sgom mo //
analyzed: tshul khrims rjes su dran pa sgom mo // gtong ba rjes su dran pa sgom mo //
translated: They cultivate the recollection of morality.🔽They cultivate the recollection of giving.

original: lha rjes su dran pa sgom mo; ;rab 'byor /🔽ji ltar na /
analyzed: lha rjes su dran pa sgom mo; ;rab 'byor / ji ltar na /
translated: They cultivate the recollection of the gods.🔽“Subhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na /
translated: how do bodhisattva great beings cultivate the recollection of the Buddha?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzugs su yid la mi byed /🔽tshor bar yid la mi byed /🔽'du shes su yid la mi byed /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzugs su yid la mi byed / tshor bar yid la mi byed / 'du shes su yid la mi byed /
translated: Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings do not pay attention to the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the perfectly enlightened Buddha as form,🔽do not pay attention to him as feeling,

original: 'du byed du yid la @365a *//
analyzed: 'du byed du yid la @365a *//
translated: do not pay attention to him as perception,🔽do not pay attention to him as volitional factors,

original: mi byed / rnam par shes par yid la mi byed do //
analyzed: mi byed / rnam par shes par yid la mi byed do //
translated: and do not pay attention to him as consciousness.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: de ni / 'di ltar gzugs la ngo bo nyid med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar gzugs la ngo bo nyid med de /
translated: it is because form has no intrinsic nature.

original: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni /
analyzed: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni /
translated: That which has no intrinsic nature

original: dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'o //
translated: is a nonthing.

original: tshor ba la ngo bo nyid med de /
analyzed: tshor ba la ngo bo nyid med de /
translated: Feeling has no intrinsic nature.

original: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni /
analyzed: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni /
translated: That which has no intrinsic nature

original: dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'o //
translated: is a nonthing.

original: 'du shes la ngo bo nyid med de /
analyzed: 'du shes la ngo bo nyid med de /
translated: Perception has no intrinsic nature.

original: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni /
analyzed: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni /

original: dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'o //
translated: is a nonthing.

original: 'du byed la ngo bo nyid med de /
analyzed: 'du byed la ngo bo nyid med de /
translated: Volitional factors have no intrinsic nature.

original: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni /
analyzed: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni /
translated: That which has no intrinsic nature

original: dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'o //
translated: is a nonthing.

original: rnam par shes pa la ngo bo nyid med de /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la ngo bo nyid med de /
translated: Consciousness has no intrinsic nature.

analyzed: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni / dngos po med pa'o //

analyzed: dngos po med pas ni /

analyzed: dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te /

analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni /
analyzed: dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni /
translated: Because the absence of recollection and the absence of mental activity

original: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o //🔽rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o // rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom na /
translated: is the recollection of the Buddha.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis yid la mi byed /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis yid la mi byed /
translated: “Moreover, Su­bhūti, when great bodhisattva beings who practice this very profound transcendent perfection of wisdom cultivate the recollection of the Buddha, they should not pay attention to the tathāgatas, arhats, genuinely perfect buddhas, who are endowed with the thirty-two major marks of a superior man.

original: sku gser gyi kha dog gis yid la mi byed /
analyzed: sku gser gyi kha dog gis yid la mi byed /
translated: They should not pay attention to their bodies, which are the color of gold.

original: 'od 'dom gang bas yid la mi byed /
analyzed: 'od 'dom gang bas yid la mi byed /
translated: They should not pay attention to their fathom-wide aura of light.

original: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus yid la mi byed do //
analyzed: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus yid la mi byed do //
translated: They should not pay attention to their eighty minor marks.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de ni / 'di ltar mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la ngo bo nyid med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la ngo bo nyid med de /
translated: Because the thirty-two major marks of a superior man have no intrinsic nature.

original: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni /
analyzed: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni /
translated: That which has no intrinsic nature

original: dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'o //
translated: it is not a thing.

original: sku gser gyi kha dog la ngo bo nyid med de /
analyzed: sku gser gyi kha dog la ngo bo nyid med de /
translated: The golden-colored body has no intrinsic nature;

analyzed: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de @365b ni; dngos po med pa'o //
translated: that which has no intrinsic nature is not a thing.

original: 'od 'dom gang ba la ngo bo nyid med de /
analyzed: 'od 'dom gang ba la ngo bo nyid med de /
translated: The fathom-wide halo of light has no intrinsic nature;

original: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o //
translated: that which has no intrinsic nature is not a thing.

analyzed: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la ngo bo nyid med de / gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni / dngos po med pa'o //

analyzed: dngos po med pas ni /

analyzed: dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te /
translated: cannot recollect a non-thing.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni /
analyzed: dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni /
translated: Because the absence of recollection and the absence of mental activity

original: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o //

analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom na /
translated: “Moreover, Su­bhūti, when great bodhisattva beings who practice this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom cultivate the recollection of the Buddha,

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshul khrims kyi phung por yid la mi byed /

analyzed: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o // rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom na /
translated: is the recollection of the Buddha.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yid la mi byed /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yid la mi byed /
translated: “Moreover, Su­bhūti, when great bodhisattva beings who practice this profound transcendent perfection of wisdom cultivate the recollection of the Buddha, they should not attend to the tathāgatas, arhats, genuinely perfect buddhas with the ten powers of the tathāgatas,

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhis yid la mi byed /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhis yid la mi byed /
translated: they should not attend to them with the four assurances,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yid la mi byed /🔽byams pa chen pos yid la mi byed /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yid la mi byed / byams pa chen pos yid la mi byed /
translated: they should not attend to them with the four kinds of exact knowledge,🔽they should not attend to them with great loving kindness,

original: snying rje chen pos yid la mi byed /
analyzed: snying rje chen pos yid la mi byed /
translated: they should not attend to them with great compassion,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yid la mi byed de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yid la mi byed de /
translated: They do not pay attention to the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de ni / 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la ngo bo nyid med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la ngo bo nyid med de /
translated: Because the ten powers of the tathāgatas are without an essence.

original: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni dngos po med pa'o //
translated: Those that are without an essence are non-entities.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la ngo bo nyid med de /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la ngo bo nyid med de /
translated: The four fearlessnesses are without an essence.

original: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni dngos po med pa'o //
translated: Those that are without an essence are non-entities.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la ngo bo nyid med do /🔽gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la ngo bo nyid med do / gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni /
translated: The four detailed and thorough knowledges are without an essence.

original: dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'o //
translated: Those that are without an essence are non-entities.

original: byams pa chen po la ngo bo nyid med de /🔽gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni /
analyzed: byams pa chen po la ngo bo nyid med de / gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni /
translated: Great love is without an essence.

original: dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'o //
translated: Those that are without an essence are non-entities.

original: snying rje chen po la ngo bo nyid med de /🔽gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni /
analyzed: snying rje chen po la ngo bo nyid med de / gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni /
translated: Great compassion is without an essence.

original: dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'o //
translated: Those that are without an essence are non-entities.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la ngo bo nyid med de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la ngo bo nyid med de /
translated: The eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas are without an essence.

original: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni /
analyzed: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni /
translated: Those which have no intrinsic nature

original: dngos po med @366b pa'o; ;dngos po med pas ni /
analyzed: dngos po med @366b pa'o; ;dngos po med pas ni /
translated: are non-entities.

original: dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te /
translated: A non-entity cannot recollect a non-entity.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni /
analyzed: dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni /
translated: Because there is no recollection and no mental activity

original: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o //
translated: is the recollection of the Buddha.

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom na /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings cultivate the recollection of the Buddha,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar yid la mi byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar yid la mi byed do //
translated: they do not mentally engage with the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Awakened One, as dependent origination.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de ni / 'di ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la ngo bo nyid med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la ngo bo nyid med de /
translated: Because dependent origination has no intrinsic nature.

original: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni /
analyzed: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni /
translated: That which has no intrinsic nature

original: dngos po med pa'o //🔽dngos po med pas ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'o // dngos po med pas ni /
translated: is a non-entity.

original: dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te /
translated: A non-entity cannot recollect a non-entity.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni /
analyzed: dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni /
translated: Because there is no recollection and no mental activity🔽is the recollection of the Buddha.

original: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o //🔽rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o // rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: is the recollection of the Buddha.

original: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, in this way, bodhisattva great beings, in regard to the non-entityness of all phenomena, should cultivate the recollection of the Buddha while practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In this way,

original: mthar gyis spyod pa dang / mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te /
analyzed: mthar gyis spyod pa dang / mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te /
translated: there is a path of gradual practice, gradual training, and gradual performance.

original: de mthar gyis spyod pa la slob cing /
analyzed: de mthar gyis spyod pa la slob cing /
translated: They train in the gradual practice,

original: mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas /
analyzed: mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas /
translated: and they train in the gradual training and the gradual path of performance.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the non-entityness of entities, they complete the perfection of generosity.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed @367a *//
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed @367a *//
translated: By way of the non-entityness of entities, they complete the perfection of moral discipline.

original: do; ;dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: do; ;dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: and the perfection of patience by the mode of non-apprehension.🔽and the perfection of perseverance by the mode of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: and the perfection of concentration by the mode of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: and the perfection of wisdom by the mode of non-apprehension.🔽and the emptiness of internal phenomena by the mode of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: and the emptiness of external phenomena by the mode of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They complete the emptiness of the external and the internal by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They complete the emptiness of emptiness by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They complete the emptiness of the great by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They complete the emptiness of the ultimate by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They complete the emptiness of the compounded by way of the non-entityness of phenomena. They complete the emptiness of the uncompounded by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid @367b yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid @367b yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they complete the emptiness that transcends limitations by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.🔽they complete the emptiness that is not terminated by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.🔽they complete the emptiness that is not discarded by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they complete the emptiness of inherent existence by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they complete the emptiness of all phenomena by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they complete the emptiness of defining characteristics by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the non-entityness of things, they perfect the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the non-entityness of things, they perfect the emptiness of non-entities.🔽By way of the non-entityness of things, they perfect the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the non-entityness of things, they perfect the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the non-entityness of things, they perfect the applications of mindfulness.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the non-entityness of things, they perfect the right efforts.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the bases of supernatural power by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams @368a *//🔽yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams @368a *// yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the faculties by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the powers by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the branches of enlightenment by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the noble eightfold path by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.🔽He perfects the noble truths by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the meditative stabilizations by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad med pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad med pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the immeasurables by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the formless absorptions by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the eight liberations by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the nine serial absorptions by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.🔽He perfects the meditative stabilization of emptiness by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the meditative stabilization of signlessness by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su @368b rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su @368b rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they perfect the meditative stabilization of wishlessness by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they perfect the clairvoyances by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they perfect the meditative stabilizations by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they perfect the dhāraṇī gateways by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they perfect the ten powers of the Tathāgata by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they perfect the four fearlessnesses by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the non-entityness of phenomena, they perfect the four detailed and thorough knowledges.🔽By way of the non-entityness of phenomena, they perfect great love.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the non-entityness of phenomena, they perfect great compassion.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the non-entityness of phenomena, they perfect the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the non-entityness of phenomena, they perfect the knowledge of all aspects.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the non-entityness of phenomena, they perfect the knowledge of paths.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: and by way of the non-entityness of entities, they complete the knowledge of all aspects.
