original: de ni / chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ni / chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
translated: They will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening that is the non-entityness of all phenomena.

original: de la dngos po yod @369a *//🔽par 'du shes pa'am /
analyzed: de la dngos po yod @369a *// par 'du shes pa'am /
translated: There, they will not have the perception of an entity🔽or the perception of a non-entity.🔽If they do not have the perception of an entity

original: dngos po med par 'du shes pa'ang med na /🔽dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa'am /
analyzed: dngos po med par 'du shes pa'ang med na / dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa'am /
translated: or the perception of a non-entity,🔽how could they have the work of mindfulness,

original: dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos /🔽rab 'byor / ji ltar na /
analyzed: dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos / rab 'byor / ji ltar na /
translated: or be without mindfulness?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na /
translated: “Subhūti, how do bodhisattva great beings cultivate recollection of the Dharma?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
translated: Subhūti, it is because from the time when the bodhisattva great beings first produce the thought [of awakening] and practice the perfection of wisdom, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects,

original: chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas chos rjes su dran pa sgom na /
analyzed: chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas chos rjes su dran pa sgom na /
translated: they realize that all phenomena are the nature of non-entityness, and then cultivate the recollection of the Dharma.

original: dge ba'i chos yid la mi byed /
analyzed: dge ba'i chos yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not attend to virtuous phenomena.

original: mi dge ba'i chos yid la mi byed /🔽'jig rten pa'i chos yid la mi byed /
analyzed: mi dge ba'i chos yid la mi byed / 'jig rten pa'i chos yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not attend to non-virtuous phenomena.🔽They do not attend to mundane phenomena.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos yid la mi byed /🔽zang zing dang bcas pa'i chos yid la mi byed /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos yid la mi byed / zang zing dang bcas pa'i chos yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not attend to supramundane phenomena.🔽They do not attend to phenomena with material things.

original: zang zing med pa'i chos yid la mi byed /
analyzed: zang zing med pa'i chos yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not attend to phenomena without material things.

original: 'phags pa'i chos yid la mi byed /🔽'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos yid la mi byed /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i chos yid la mi byed / 'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not attend to noble phenomena.🔽They do not attend to non-noble phenomena.

original: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos yid la mi byed /
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not attend to phenomena with outflows.

original: zag pa med pa'i chos yid la mi byed /
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i chos yid la mi byed /
translated: He does not pay attention to the uncontaminated dharmas.

original: 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i chos yid la mi byed /🔽gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa'i chos yid la mi byed /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i chos yid la mi byed / gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa'i chos yid la mi byed /
translated: He does not pay attention to the dharmas included in the desire realm.🔽He does not pay attention to the dharmas included in the form realm.

original: gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i chos yid la mi byed /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i chos yid la mi byed /
translated: He does not pay attention to the dharmas included in the formless realm.

original: 'dus byas kyi chos yid la mi byed /
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi chos yid la mi byed /
translated: He does not pay attention to compounded dharmas.

original: 'dus ma byas kyi chos @369b yid la mi byed do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi chos @369b yid la mi byed do //
translated: He does not pay attention to uncompounded dharmas.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de ni / 'di ltar chos de dag la ngo bo nyid med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar chos de dag la ngo bo nyid med de /
translated: Because those dharmas have no intrinsic nature.

original: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni /
analyzed: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni /
translated: Those that have no intrinsic nature

original: dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'o //
translated: are non-entities.

original: dngos po med pas ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pas ni /
translated: And because of being a non-entity,

original: dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te /
translated: a non-entity cannot be recollected.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de ni / 'di ltar dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni /
translated: Because that which is without recollection and without attention

original: chos rjes su dran pa'o //
analyzed: chos rjes su dran pa'o //
translated: is the recollection of the Dharma.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
translated: Subhūti, that is

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste /
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom with respect to the nonexistence of the intrinsic identity of all dharmas should cultivate the recollection of the Dharma.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
translated: Subhūti, it is thus

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar gyis spyad pa dang / mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar gyis spyad pa dang / mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te /
translated: that there is a bodhisattva great beings’ gradual practice, a gradual training, and a gradual path.

original: de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar gyis spyad pa la slob cing /
analyzed: de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar gyis spyad pa la slob cing /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings training in the gradual practice,

original: mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas /
analyzed: mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas /
translated: training in the gradual training, and training in the gradual path

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: complete the perfection of giving by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic identity.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They complete the perfection of morality by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic identity.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they perfect the transcendent perfection of tolerance by way of the non-entityness of phenomena;

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan @370a *//
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan @370a *//
translated: they perfect the transcendent perfection of perseverance by way of the non-entityness of phenomena;

original: gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they perfect the transcendent perfection of concentration by way of the non-entityness of phenomena;

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they perfect the transcendent perfection of wisdom by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.🔽They perfect inner emptiness by way of the non-entityness of phenomena;

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they perfect outer emptiness by way of the non-entityness of phenomena;

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They complete the emptiness of the inner and outer, in the manner of the unreality of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They complete the emptiness of emptiness, in the manner of the unreality of things.🔽They complete the emptiness of the great, in the manner of the unreality of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They complete the emptiness of the ultimate, in the manner of the unreality of things.🔽They complete the emptiness of the compounded, in the manner of the unreality of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They complete the emptiness of the uncompounded, in the manner of the unreality of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the mode of non-entityness, they perfect the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the mode of non-entityness, they perfect the emptiness of no beginning and no end.🔽By way of the mode of non-entityness, they perfect the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang @370b bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang @370b bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the mode of non-entityness, they perfect the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the mode of non-entityness, they perfect the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the mode of non-entityness, they perfect the emptiness of defining attributes.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the non-entityness of things, they perfect the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the non-entityness of things, they perfect the emptiness of non-entities.🔽By way of the non-entityness of things, they perfect the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the non-entityness of things, they perfect the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the non-entityness of things, they perfect the applications of mindfulness.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the non-entityness of things, they perfect the right efforts.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the bases of supernatural powers by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.🔽He perfects the faculties by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the powers by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan @371a *//
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan @371a *//
translated: He perfects the branches of enlightenment by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the noble eightfold path by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.🔽He perfects the noble truths by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the meditative stabilizations by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad med pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad med pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the formless absorptions by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the eight liberations by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the nine serial absorptions by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.🔽He perfects the meditative stabilization of emptiness by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the meditative stabilization of signlessness by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the concentration of wishlessness by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams songs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams songs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the clairvoyances by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the meditative stabilizations by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs @371b kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs @371b kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the dhāraṇī gateways by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the ten powers of the tathāgatas by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the four fearlessnesses by way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: and the detailed and thorough cognisance of the Dharma, by the mode of the unreality of things.🔽He perfects the great love, by the mode of the unreality of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the great compassion, by the mode of the unreality of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the eighteen special attributes of a Buddha, by the mode of the unreality of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the knowledge of all things, by the mode of the unreality of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the knowledge of the modes of the path, by the mode of the unreality of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: and by way of the non-entityness of entities, they complete the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ni / chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /🔽de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa'am /
analyzed: de ni / chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te / de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa'am /
translated: They will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening that is the non-entityness of all phenomena.🔽There, they will not have the idea of an entity

original: dngos po med par 'du shes pa'ang med na /🔽dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa'am /
analyzed: dngos po med par 'du shes pa'ang med na / dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa'am /
translated: or the idea of a non-entity.🔽How could they have the work of mindfulness even as small as the tip of a hair,

original: dran pa dang bral par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos /🔽rab 'byor / ji ltar na /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge 'dun @372a *//
analyzed: dran pa dang bral par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos / rab 'byor / ji ltar na / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge 'dun @372a *//
translated: or be without mindfulness?

original: rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na /
translated: “Subhūti, how do bodhisattva great beings cultivate the recollection of the Saṅgha?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
translated: Subhūti, here, starting from the first production of the thought, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects,

original: chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas dge 'dun rjes su dran pa sgom ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas dge 'dun rjes su dran pa sgom ste /
translated: they cultivate recollection of the community after realizing that all phenomena are the nature of non-entityness.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba phun sum tshogs pa'i skyes bu zung bzhi dang / skyes bu gang zag brgyad po de dag dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du yid la byed do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba phun sum tshogs pa'i skyes bu zung bzhi dang / skyes bu gang zag brgyad po de dag dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du yid la byed do //
translated: They attend to the four pairs of persons and the eight individual persons in the Lord’s śrāvaka community, who are endowed with perfect morality, concentration, wisdom, freedom, and knowledge and insight of freedom, as having the nature of non-entityness.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di ni / 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid med de //
analyzed: 'di ni / 'di ltar de dag la ngo bo nyid med de //
translated: It is because they have no intrinsic nature.

original: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni /
analyzed: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni /
translated: Those which have no intrinsic nature

original: dngos po med pa'o //🔽dngos po med pas ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'o // dngos po med pas ni /
translated: are non-entities.🔽And a non-entity cannot

original: dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te /
translated: recall a non-entity.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?🔽Because it is thus:

original: de ni / 'di ltar dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni /
translated: the mindfulness that is without mindfulness and without attention is

original: dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'o //
translated: the mindfulness of the Saṅgha.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas dge 'dun rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste /🔽rab 'byor / de ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas dge 'dun rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste / rab 'byor / de ltar na /
translated: “Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom like that, with all dharmas’ entitylessness as their entity, should cultivate the mindfulness of the Saṅgha.🔽Subhūti, bodhisattva great beings

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i @372b mthar gyis spyod pa yod ma yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i @372b mthar gyis spyod pa yod ma yin /
translated: like that have a step-by-step practice,

original: mthar gyis bslab pa yod pa yin /
analyzed: mthar gyis bslab pa yod pa yin /
translated: have a step-by-step training,

original: mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te /
analyzed: mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te /
translated: and have a step-by-step path to enter.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthar gyis spyod pa la slob cing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthar gyis spyod pa la slob cing /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings training in the step-by-step practice

original: mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas /
analyzed: mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas /
translated: They train in the path of the gradual training and the gradual path.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They complete the perfection of generosity by way of the mode of non-entityness.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They complete the perfection of ethical discipline by way of the mode of non-entityness.🔽They complete the perfection of patience by way of the mode of non-entityness.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They complete the perfection of effort by way of the mode of non-entityness.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They complete the perfection of concentration by way of the mode of non-entityness.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: and the perfection of wisdom is fulfilled by way of the non-entityness of things.🔽The emptiness of internal is fulfilled by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: The emptiness of external is fulfilled by way of the non-entityness of things.🔽The emptiness of external and internal is fulfilled by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid @373a *//
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid @373a *//
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is fulfilled by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: The emptiness of great extent is fulfilled by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They perfect the emptiness of conditioned phenomena by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They perfect the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They perfect the emptiness of what is beyond extremes by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They perfect the emptiness of no beginning and no end by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They perfect the emptiness of non-rejection by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they complete the perfection of the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they complete the perfection of the emptiness of all phenomena.🔽they complete the perfection of the emptiness of defining attributes.🔽they complete the perfection of the emptiness of non-observation.🔽they complete the perfection of the emptiness of the non-existence of own-being.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs @373b su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs @373b su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they complete the perfection of the emptiness of inherent nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the reality of non-entityness, they perfect the emptiness that is the reality of non-entityness.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the reality of non-entityness, they perfect the applications of mindfulness.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the reality of non-entityness, they perfect the right efforts.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the reality of non-entityness, they perfect the legs of miraculous power.🔽By way of the reality of non-entityness, they perfect the faculties.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the reality of non-entityness, they perfect the powers.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: and the factors of awakening are perfected by way of the mode of non-entityness.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: The noble eightfold path is perfected by way of the mode of non-entityness.🔽The noble truths are perfected by way of the mode of non-entityness.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: The meditative stabilizations are perfected by way of the mode of non-entityness.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad med pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad med pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: The immeasurables are perfected by way of the mode of non-entityness.🔽The formless absorptions are perfected by way of the mode of non-entityness.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: The liberations are perfected by way of the mode of non-entityness.🔽The correct and discerning awarenesses are perfected by way of the mode of non-entityness.🔽The powers are perfected by way of the mode of non-entityness.🔽The fearlessnesses are perfected by way of the mode of non-entityness.🔽The detailed and thorough knowledges are perfected by way of the mode of non-entityness.🔽The aspects of liberation are perfected by way of the mode of non-entityness.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis tshul gyis rnam par @374a *//
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis tshul gyis rnam par @374a *//
translated: The unique qualities of a buddha are perfected by way of the mode of non-entityness.🔽The knowledge of all aspects is perfected by way of the mode of non-entityness.🔽The knowledge of path aspects is perfected by way of the mode of non-entityness.🔽The knowledge of all bases is perfected by way of the mode of non-entityness.🔽The knowledge of the aspects of the path is perfected by way of the mode of non-entityness.🔽The knowledge of all aspects is perfected by way of the mode of non-entityness.🔽The knowledge of all bases is perfected by way of the mode of non-entityness.🔽The knowledge of the aspects of the path is perfected by way of the mode of non-entityness.🔽The knowledge of all aspects is perfected by way of the mode of non-entityness.🔽The knowledge of all bases is perfected by way of the mode of non-entityness.🔽The knowledge of the aspects of the path is perfected by way of the mode of non-entityness.🔽The knowledge of all aspects is perfected by way of the mode of non-entityness.🔽The knowledge of all bases is perfected by way of the mode of non-entityness.🔽The knowledge of the aspects of the path is perfected by way of the mode of non-entityness.🔽The knowledge of all aspects is perfected by way of the mode

original: thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they perfect the eight liberations;🔽they perfect the nine serial absorptions by way of the emptiness of non-apprehension;🔽they perfect the emptiness meditative stabilization by way of the emptiness of non-apprehension;🔽they perfect the signless meditative stabilization by way of the emptiness of non-apprehension;🔽they perfect the wishless meditative stabilization by way of the emptiness of non-apprehension;

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they perfect the five clairvoyances by way of the emptiness of non-apprehension;🔽they perfect the five eyes by way of the emptiness of non-apprehension;🔽they perfect the ten powers of the Tathāgata by way of the emptiness of non-apprehension;

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they perfect the four fearlessnesses by way of the emptiness of non-apprehension;🔽they perfect the four detailed and thorough knowledges by way of the emptiness of non-apprehension;🔽they perfect the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha by way of the emptiness of non-apprehension;

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they perfect the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening by way of the emptiness of non-apprehension;🔽they perfect the thirty-two major marks of a great man by way of the emptiness of non-apprehension;

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they perfect the eighty minor characteristics by way of the emptiness of non-apprehension;🔽they perfect the knowledge of all aspects by way of the emptiness of non-apprehension;🔽they perfect the knowledge of paths by way of the emptiness of non-apprehension;🔽they perfect the knowledge of all bases by way of the emptiness of non-apprehension;🔽they perfect the knowledge of all kinds of liberations by way of the emptiness of non-apprehension;🔽they perfect the knowledge of the thoughts of others by way of the emptiness of non-apprehension;🔽they perfect the knowledge of past lives by way of the emptiness of non-apprehension;🔽they perfect the knowledge of future lives by way of the emptiness of non-apprehension;🔽they perfect the knowledge of the exhaustion of contaminants by way of the emptiness of non-apprehension;🔽they perfect the knowledge of the exhaustion of contaminants by way of the emptiness of non-apprehension;🔽they perfect the knowledge of the exhaustion of contaminants by way of the emptiness of non-apprehension;🔽they perfect the knowledge of the exhaustion of contaminants by way of the emptiness of non-apprehension;🔽they perfect the knowledge of the exhaustion of contaminants by way of the emptiness of non-apprehension;

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: and the dhāraṇī gateways are perfected by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: The ten powers of the tathāgatas are perfected by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: The four fearlessnesses are perfected by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.🔽The four detailed and thorough knowledges are perfected by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: Great love is perfected by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par @374b byed do; ;dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par @374b byed do; ;dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: “They complete the ten tathāgata powers by way of the non-entityness of phenomena, complete the four fearlessnesses by way of the non-entityness of phenomena, complete the four detailed and thorough knowledges by way of the non-entityness of phenomena, complete the great love by way of the non-entityness of phenomena, complete the great compassion by way of the non-entityness of phenomena, and complete the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: “They complete the knowledge of all aspects by way of the non-entityness of phenomena, complete the knowledge of paths by way of the non-entityness of phenomena, and complete the knowledge of all bases by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: de ni / chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ni / chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
translated: “They will fully awaken to all dharmas’ non-entityness.

original: de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa'am /
analyzed: de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa'am /
translated: They do not have the idea that there is an entity there,

original: dngos po med par 'du shes pa'ang med na /🔽dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa'am /
analyzed: dngos po med par 'du shes pa'ang med na / dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa'am /
translated: and there is no perception of non-entities,🔽how could there be any trace of the activity of mindfulness,

original: dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos /🔽rab 'byor / ji ltar na /
analyzed: dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos / rab 'byor / ji ltar na /
translated: let alone being separated from mindfulness?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na /
translated: “Su­bhūti, how do great bodhisattva beings practice the recollection of ethical discipline?

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
translated: Su­bhūti, great bodhisattva beings, from the time when they first begin to set their mind on enlightenment, practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom, and, endowed with the mind of unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment, they contemplate the recollection of ethical discipline, having realized that all things are devoid of essential nature.

original: chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas tshul khrims rjes su dran pa bsgom zhing /
analyzed: chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas tshul khrims rjes su dran pa bsgom zhing /
translated: They contemplate the recollection of ethical discipline without violating it,

original: ma ral ba /🔽ma zhig ba /🔽ma 'dres pa /🔽skyon med pa /
analyzed: ma ral ba / ma zhig ba / ma 'dres pa / skyon med pa /
translated: without breaking it,🔽without corrupting it,🔽without being flawed,

original: ma nyams pa /
analyzed: ma nyams pa /
translated: without being impaired,

original: mthu dang ldan pa /
analyzed: mthu dang ldan pa /
translated: with power,

original: mkhas pas bsngags pa /
analyzed: mkhas pas bsngags pa /
translated: and with the praise of the learned.

original: @375a *// shin tu rdzogs pa /
analyzed: @375a *// shin tu rdzogs pa /
translated: very complete,

original: ting nge 'dzin yongs su sgrub pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin yongs su sgrub pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa yin te /
translated: and abiding in the morality of accomplishing meditative stabilization.🔽He attends to that morality as having the nature of the absence of an intrinsic nature.

original: de tshul khrims de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du yid la byed do; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽de ni / 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med de /
analyzed: de tshul khrims de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du yid la byed do; ;de ci'i phyir zhe na / de ni / 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med de /
translated: And why?🔽Because it has no intrinsic nature.

original: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni /
analyzed: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni /
translated: That which has no intrinsic nature

original: dngos po med pa'o //🔽dngos po med pas ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'o // dngos po med pas ni /
translated: is a non-entity.

original: dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te /
translated: A non-entity cannot recall a non-entity.🔽And why?

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽de ni / 'di ltar dran pa med cing /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / de ni / 'di ltar dran pa med cing /
translated: Because it is thus:

original: yid la bya ba med pa ni /
analyzed: yid la bya ba med pa ni /
translated: that which is without recollection and without attention

original: tshul khrims rjes su dran pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims rjes su dran pa'o //
translated: is the recollection of morality.🔽Subhūti,

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
translated: thus,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom, with all phenomena having the nature of the absence of an intrinsic nature,

original: tshul khrims rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: tshul khrims rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste /
translated: are cultivating the recollection of morality,

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
translated: Subhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthar gyis spyad pa yod pa yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthar gyis spyad pa yod pa yin /
translated: “There is a bodhisattva great beings’ sequential practice,

original: mthar gyis bslab pa yod pa yin /
analyzed: mthar gyis bslab pa yod pa yin /
translated: there is a sequential training,

original: mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te /
analyzed: mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te /
translated: and there is a sequential path of engagement.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthar gyis spyad pa la slob cing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthar gyis spyad pa la slob cing /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings train in the sequential practice,

original: mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas /
analyzed: mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas /
translated: train in the sequential training, and train in the sequential path of engagement.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature, they perfect the perfection of generosity. By way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature, they perfect the perfection of ethical discipline.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa @375b yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa @375b yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By way of the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature, they perfect the perfection of patience.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they perfect the transcendent perfection of perseverance by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they perfect the transcendent perfection of meditative stability by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they perfect the transcendent perfection of wisdom by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.🔽they perfect inner emptiness by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.🔽they perfect outer emptiness by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: they perfect inner and outer emptiness by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the emptiness of emptiness by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the emptiness of the great by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the emptiness of the ultimate by way of the non-entityness of things.🔽He perfects the emptiness of the compounded by way of the non-entityness of things.🔽He perfects the emptiness of the uncompounded by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the emptiness of what is beyond extremes by way of the non-entityness of things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis tshul gyis thog ma dang tha med pa stong pa nyid yongs su @376a *//🔽su  rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis tshul gyis thog ma dang tha med pa stong pa nyid yongs su @376a *// su  rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By the principle of the insubstantiality of things, he perfects the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.🔽By the principle of the insubstantiality of things, he perfects the emptiness of nonrejection.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By the principle of the insubstantiality of things, he perfects the emptiness of inherent natures.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By the principle of the insubstantiality of things, he perfects the emptiness of all things.🔽By the principle of the insubstantiality of things, he perfects the emptiness of specific characteristics.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: By the principle of the insubstantiality of things, he perfects the emptiness of nonapprehension.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They perfect the emptiness of the beginningless and endless by way of the non-entityness of the beginningless and endless.🔽They perfect the emptiness of non-rejection by way of the non-entityness of non-rejection.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They perfect the emptiness of nature by way of the non-entityness of nature.🔽They perfect the emptiness of all phenomena by way of the non-entityness of all phenomena.🔽They perfect the emptiness of specific characteristics by way of the non-entityness of specific characteristics.🔽They perfect the emptiness of non-apprehension by way of the non-entityness of non-apprehension.🔽They perfect the emptiness of essential nature by way of the non-entityness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They perfect the emptiness of non-entities by way of the non-entityness of non-entities.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They perfect the applications of mindfulness by way of the non-entityness of non-entities.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They perfect the right efforts by way of the non-entityness of non-entities.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They perfect the legs of miraculous power by way of the non-entityness of non-entities.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the faculties by way of the non-entityness of entities.

original: dngos po med pa'i @376b ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i @376b ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the powers by way of the non-entityness of entities.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the branches of awakening by way of the non-entityness of entities.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the noble eightfold path by way of the non-entityness of entities.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the noble truths by way of the non-entityness of entities. He perfects the meditative stabilizations by way of the non-entityness of entities.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad med pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis tshad med pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do; ;dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the formless absorptions by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the eight deliverances by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the nine serial absorptions by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.🔽He perfects the meditative stabilization of emptiness by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the meditative stabilization of signlessness by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They perfect the meditative stabilization of wishlessness by way of the non-entityness of entities.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs @377a *//🔽par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs @377a *// par byed do //
translated: They perfect the superknowledges by way of the non-entityness of entities.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They perfect the meditative stabilizations by way of the non-entityness of entities.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They perfect the dhāraṇī gateways by way of the non-entityness of entities.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They perfect the ten powers of the tathāgatas by way of the non-entityness of entities.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: They perfect the fearlessnesses by way of the non-entityness of entities.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do //🔽dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the analytical knowledges by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.🔽He perfects the great love by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the great compassion by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the eighteen distinct attributes of a Buddha by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the knowledge of all aspects by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the knowledge of path aspects by way of the non-entityness of phenomena.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: and by way of the non-entityness of entities, they complete the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ni / chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ni / chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te /
translated: They will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening that is the non-entityness of all phenomena.

original: de la dngos po yod par 'du shes @377b pa'am; dngos po med par 'du shes pa'ang med na /🔽dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa'am /
analyzed: de la dngos po yod par 'du shes @377b pa'am; dngos po med par 'du shes pa'ang med na / dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa'am /
translated: There, they will not even have the idea of an entity or the idea of a non-entity.

original: dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos /🔽rab 'byor / ji ltar na /
analyzed: dran pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos / rab 'byor / ji ltar na /
translated: What need is there to say more about being free from mindfulness?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtong ba rjes su dran pa bsgom pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtong ba rjes su dran pa bsgom pa yin zhe na /
translated: “Subhūti, how do bodhisattva great beings cultivate the practice of recollecting generosity?

original: rab 'byor / 'di ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ni /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
translated: “When bodhisattva great beings, from the time when they first begin to set their mind on enlightenment, practice the perfection of wisdom, with attention connected to the knowledge of all aspects,

original: chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtog par byas nas gtong ba rjes su dran pa bsgom zhing /
analyzed: chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtog par byas nas gtong ba rjes su dran pa bsgom zhing /
translated: they should contemplate the recollection of giving, having realized that all phenomena are the nature of unreality.

original: gang zang zing gtong ba dang / chos gtong ba yid la mi byed do //
analyzed: gang zang zing gtong ba dang / chos gtong ba yid la mi byed do //
translated: They should not pay attention to giving material things or giving the Dharma.

original: de yan lag dang nying lag kyang yongs su gtong na /
analyzed: de yan lag dang nying lag kyang yongs su gtong na /
translated: If they give away their major and minor body parts,

original: dngos po gzhan lta ci zhig smos /
analyzed: dngos po gzhan lta ci zhig smos /
translated: what need is there to mention other things?

original: de ltar sbyin pa yongs su gtang yang /
analyzed: de ltar sbyin pa yongs su gtang yang /
translated: In this way, they should give gifts,

original: 'di ltar bdag ni /🔽sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'o //🔽dngos po 'di gtong ba'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag ni / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'o // dngos po 'di gtong ba'o //
translated: but they should not think,🔽‘I am giving gifts.🔽I am giving this thing.

original: 'di la gtong bar bya'o //🔽snyam du mi sems so //
analyzed: 'di la gtong bar bya'o // snyam du mi sems so //
translated: I am giving to this person.’

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni; 'di ltar dngos po de dag la ngo bo nyid med de /
analyzed: de ni; 'di ltar dngos po de dag la ngo bo nyid med de /
translated: It is because those things have no intrinsic nature.

original: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni /
analyzed: gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni /
translated: Those which have no intrinsic nature

original: dngos po med pa'o //🔽dngos po med pas ni /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'o // dngos po med pas ni /
translated: are non-entities.🔽And non-entities cannot

original: dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te /
analyzed: dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te /
translated: remember non-entities.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na; de ni /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na; de ni /
translated: And why?

original: 'di ltar dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni /
translated: Because there is no recollection and no mental activity🔽in that.

original: gtong ba rjes su dran pa'o //🔽rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po med @378a *//
analyzed: gtong ba rjes su dran pa'o // rab 'byor / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po med @378a *//
translated: This is the recollection of giving.

original: pa'i ngo bo nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gtong ba rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: pa'i ngo bo nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gtong ba rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste /
translated: “Subhūti, thus should bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom, with all things having the essence of non-entity, cultivate the recollection of giving.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar gyis spyad pa yod pa yin /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar gyis spyad pa yod pa yin /
translated: Subhūti, thus🔽there is a bodhisattva great beings’ successive practice,

original: mthar gyis bslab pa yod pa yin /
analyzed: mthar gyis bslab pa yod pa yin /
translated: there is a bodhisattva great beings’ successive training,
